text: :wave-yeti: were you able to figure out what was causing that original 403 error? You mentioned it was a cloned action. I know we’ve had issues in the past with clones so something like this may need a deeper investigation by one of the engineers on my team.
No clue! I just rewrote the console log and went ahead.
Did rewriting it get it to work?
As soon as I removed that part of the log all together it worked just fine
So I no longer mentioned the property name
huh, that’s weird. I have no idea what would cause that.
Such a strange issue
I figure it had something to do with being logged out because of the UI update and possibly messing with the saved version of that coded action
That sounds logical to me :laughing:
Hi This is shivam I am trying to learn HubSpot
Hi everyone! I'm Claire, a data engineer at Combined Jewish Philanthropies. I'm working on some integrations among HubSpot and our other systems.

I’ve done it in the past with an image upload field,
Basically using JS to replace the field with a canvas, and then saving the blob and uploading that, it’s a little tricky but it worked
you mean just a normal file field?
A contact property with the field type “File”
yep yep, done that one before as well. Signature pad has a nice little api for getting the blob data: <https://github.com/szimek/signature_pad>

I believe I used something like this
<https://codepen.io/yguo/pen/OyYGxQ>

I’ve found my code, I had to prevent the form from sending then use ajax to submit the data appending the blob file to the signature field

That also meant I needed to manually do the redirect/thankyou message
All theme modules have disappeared and been replaced with default (categorized) hs modules. The “all” tab shows all modules in the portal
<@U2H3TT8F2> did the new update do this? :grimacing: Now users can’t find their theme’s default modules
hrmmm that doesnt seem right. Let me loop in with some people internally and see what I can find out. Can you send me a DM with the link to that portal?
What theme is this?

:HubSpotheart:*Help your fellow HubSpot Developers!*:HubSpotheart:

This Slack lives and breathes by its community. If you're posting a question, take a moment and click around a few channels to see if there are any questions you can help answer. Instant karma!
<@U3T21PDBK> are there any modules that were previously in the theme that are now missing?

I just want our users to see theme modules first and avoid seeing default HubSpot modules as much as possible (could be as simple as adding a field in theme.json, like disableDefaultModules: true), this new interface is going the exact opposite direction I need it to be

It started working now. I found a typo in my class name.
Hi everyone  Please let me know how to create new quotes section in HubSpot

Is there a trick to updating the header/footer on existing pages after making a change? I made a change to navigation via Settings > Website > Navigation, but I have to clone a page in order to see the changes, which doesn't work well.
hello

I need help.

I think I have a problem in cookies issue. I hope you can help me with this. Here's the scenario:

We needed to automatically sync the contacts from Wix contact form to HubSpot.

I added the tracking code of HubSpot in the Wix custom code. So it is now working. The problem is, when I submit a contact in the contact form, it will be stored in HubSpot automatically which is what we want. But when I will try to submit another contact in the contact form, the previous one will be removed and the new one will be stored.

I read an article that it  overrides the previous contact if they are from the same IP address or network connection, resulting in the removal of the previous entry. And it's a cookie issue. There is also an article here to address the issue of override: <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/api/events/cookie-banner?_ga=2.185462825.141617532.1689222626-1167094308.1689222626>

so that even with the same IP or browser, it won't override.

Can somebody help me how to add the code in Wix? or should I add this in HubSpot? Apologies but I am not a developer but I can understand if someone can teach me how.

Thanks in advance!

Try modifying your HubSpot Form's setting to "Always create new contact for new email address"
<https://HubSpotdev.slack.com/archives/C22PU4LV8/p1688692024916259?thread_ts=1688673740.959309&cid=C22PU4LV8>
thanks for the response
